curated_text: Symbol: CSCO. Year: 2022. Period: Y2022. ReportType: K10. Section: Competition and Market Position. This section discusses competitors, market dynamics, and regulatory landscape.  Competitors mentioned: • Direct, Channels, Acquisitions, Investments, Build Working, Invest, Apple Inc., Equinix Inc., Google LLC, International 7 Table of, Contents Business Machines Corporation, Microsoft Corporation, Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd., Amazon Web Services LLC, Amazon Web Services, Arista Networks, Inc., Broadcom Inc., Check Point Software Technologies Ltd., Ciena Corporation, CrowdStrike Holdings, Inc., Datadog Inc., Dell Technologies Inc., Dynatrace Inc., Fortinet, Inc., Hewlett-Packard Enterprise Company, Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd., Juniper Networks, Inc., Nokia Corporation, Palo Alto Networks, Inc., RingCentral, Ubiquiti Inc., VMware, Zoom Video Communications, Inc., Zscaler, Inc., Contents Research and Development, Secure, Agile Networks, International Organization for Standardization 9001, 9 Table of Contents.
